searchQuery.query:
source logs 
#Lets get average and sum statistics on all logs
| agg count() as a_Sum.Log_Count,
      round(avg(byteLength($d:string)),2) as b_Avg.Data, 
      round(avg(byteLength($l:string)),2) as b_Avg.Labels,
      round(avg(byteLength($m:string)),2) as b_Avg.Metadata,
      round(sum(byteLength($d:string)),2) as a_Sum.Data, 
      round(sum(byteLength($l:string)),2) as a_Sum.Labels,
      round(sum(byteLength($m:string)),2) as a_Sum.Metadata   
#Now lets stich together the resource attriues average and sum data   
| stitch (source logs
    | choose resource.attributes
    | agg round(avg(byteLength($d:string)),2) as Avg_RA,
          round(sum(byteLength($d:string)),2) as Sum_RA)  into RA
|create a_Sum.RA from RA.Sum_RA
|create b_Avg.RA from RA.Avg_RA
#Create Totals
|create b_Avg.Log_Size from b_Avg.Data+b_Avg.Labels+b_Avg.Metadata
|create a_Sum.Log_Size from a_Sum.Data+a_Sum.Labels+a_Sum.Metadata
#Now - Lets calculate percentiles
|create c_Pct.Total.RA_Data from round(100*a_Sum.RA/a_Sum.Data,2)
|create c_Pct.Total.RA_All from round(100*a_Sum.RA/(a_Sum.Data+a_Sum.Labels+a_Sum.Metadata),2)
|create c_Pct.Total.Labels from round(100*(a_Sum.Labels)/(a_Sum.Data+a_Sum.Labels+a_Sum.Metadata),2)
|create c_Pct.Total.Metadata from round(100*(a_Sum.Metadata)/(a_Sum.Data+a_Sum.Labels+a_Sum.Metadata),2)
|create c_Pct.Total.CX from round(100*(a_Sum.Labels+a_Sum.Metadata)/(a_Sum.Data+a_Sum.Labels+a_Sum.Metadata),2)
|create c_Pct.Total.Addition from round(100*(a_Sum.RA+a_Sum.Labels+a_Sum.Metadata)/(a_Sum.Data+a_Sum.Labels+a_Sum.Metadata),2)

|create c_Pct.Avg.RA_Data from round(100*b_Avg.RA/b_Avg.Data,2)
|create c_Pct.Avg.RA_All from round(100*b_Avg.RA/(b_Avg.Data+b_Avg.Labels+b_Avg.Metadata),2)
|create c_Pct.Avg.Labels from round(100*(b_Avg.Labels)/(b_Avg.Data+b_Avg.Labels+b_Avg.Metadata),2)
|create c_Pct.Avg.Metadata from round(100*(b_Avg.Metadata)/(b_Avg.Data+b_Avg.Labels+b_Avg.Metadata),2)
|create c_Pct.Avg.CX from round(100*(b_Avg.Labels+b_Avg.Metadata)/(b_Avg.Data+b_Avg.Labels+b_Avg.Metadata),2)
|create c_Pct.Avg.Addition from round(100*(b_Avg.RA+b_Avg.Labels+b_Avg.Metadata)/(b_Avg.Data+b_Avg.Labels+b_Avg.Metadata),2)

|choose a_Sum, b_Avg, c_Pct
